P

Patient - Class in tue.yellow
Patient is the class for all patients that enter and have entered the emergency department.
Patient(String, String, Patient.TriageUrgency, Bed.Zone, ListTracker) - Constructor for class tue.yellow.Patient
Creates a patient object using 5 input values:
1) Name of the patient
2) Complaints of the patient
3) Triage urgency of the patient (IMMEDIATE, VERY_URGENT,URGENT,STANDARD,NON_URGENT)
4) Triage zone of the patient (TRAUMA/NO_INJURY)
5) List (emergency room) to which the patient belongs
This constructor adds the patient to the list of the emergency room upon creation.
Patient(int, ListTracker) - Constructor for class tue.yellow.Patient
Creates a number of patient objects, all with a generic name (patient i).
Patient.HealthStatus - Enum in tue.yellow
 
Patient.Status - Enum in tue.yellow
 
Patient.TriageUrgency - Enum in tue.yellow
 
patientDie(Patient) - Method in class tue.yellow.Patient
In the unfortunate case that a patient dies during his/her stay in the emergency room, this method is called.
performBloodSampling(Patient) - Method in class tue.yellow.Nurse
Performs a Blood Sampling on the patient, if the nurse is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another nurse, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
performBoarding(Patient) - Method in class tue.yellow.Nurse
Performs Boarding on the patient, if the nurse is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another nurse, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
performClinicalExam(Patient) - Method in class tue.yellow.Doctor
Performs a Clinical Examination on the patient, if the doctor is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another doctor, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
performClinicalExam(Patient, ListTracker) - Method in class tue.yellow.Nurse
Performs a Clinical Examination on the patient, if the nurse is available to perform treatment, and the patient is not already treated by another nurse, and the patient is assigned to a bed.
